documentation.text:
Hashima Protocol
Hashimon, Game-Fi on top of Hashima
This contract is in charge of the Counter update
 @dev ERC721 token with proof of work inyected in the structure.
by: Aaron Tolentino

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
